name: InkResponse
desc: An area of a [Material] that responds to touch. Has a configurable shape and can be configured to clip splashes that extend outside its bounds or not.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when the user taps this part of the material.

fields.name: onTapDown
fields.desc: Called when the user taps down this part of the material.

fields.name: onTapUp
fields.desc: Called when the user releases a tap that was started on this part of the material. [onTap] is called immediately after.

fields.name: onTapCancel
fields.desc: Called when the user cancels a tap that was started on this part of the material.

fields.name: onDoubleTap
fields.desc: Called when the user double taps this part of the material.

fields.name: onLongPress
fields.desc: Called when the user long-presses on this part of the material.

fields.name: onSecondaryTap
fields.desc: Called when the user taps this part of the material with a secondary button.

fields.name: onSecondaryTapDown
fields.desc: Called when the user taps down on this part of the material with a secondary button.

fields.name: onSecondaryTapUp
fields.desc: Called when the user releases a secondary button tap that was started on this part of the material. [onSecondaryTap] is called immediately after.

fields.name: onSecondaryTapCancel
fields.desc: Called when the user cancels a secondary button tap that was started on this part of the material.

fields.name: onHighlightChanged
fields.desc: Called when this part of the material either becomes highlighted or stops being highlighted.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the ink response area.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: containedInkWell
fields.desc: Whether this ink response should be clipped its bounds.

fields.name: highlightShape
fields.desc: The shape (e.g., circle, rectangle) to use for the highlight drawn around this part of the material when pressed, hovered over, or focused.

fields.name: radius
fields.desc: The radius of the ink splash.

fields.name: borderRadius
fields.desc: The border radius of the containing rectangle. This is effective only if [highlightShape] is [BoxShape.rectangle].

fields.name: customBorder
fields.desc: The custom clip border.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color of the ink response when the parent widget is focused. If this property is null then the focus color of the theme, [ThemeData.focusColor], will be used.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color of the ink response when a pointer is hovering over it. If this property is null then the hover color of the theme, [ThemeData.hoverColor], will be used.

fields.name: highlightColor
fields.desc: The highlight color of the ink response when pressed. If this property is null then the highlight color of the theme, [ThemeData.highlightColor], will be used.

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: Defines the ink response focus, hover, and splash colors.

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The splash color of the ink response. If this property is null then the splash color of the theme, [ThemeData.splashColor], will be used.

fields.name: splashFactory
fields.desc: Defines the appearance of the splash.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: excludeFromSemantics
fields.desc: Whether to exclude the gestures introduced by this widget from the semantics tree.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.inkwell.onFocusChange} Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: canRequestFocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.canRequestFocus}

fields.name: statesController
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.inkwell.statesController} Represents the interactive "state" of this widget in terms of a set of [WidgetState]s, like [WidgetState.pressed] and [WidgetState.focused].

fields.name: hoverDuration
fields.desc: The duration of the animation that animates the hover effect.
